review: My dad had chest pain and he helped overcome with his expertise. Excellent human, god bless him and his family.

My husband had a heart attack and dr vikranth veeranna did the angioplasty and stent.. he did an excellent job and my husband is fine now. We are forever grateful for his service. God bless him with health, wealth and happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ************* He diagnoses systematically. Patiently listens to all the problems. Makes sure doesn't prescribe unnecessary medication. Go to doctor for heart related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review:
Dr Vikranth is very friendly and speaks nicely with patients, 
His explanations about the problems and treatments are excellent.
I underwent angioplasty with a stent. I was keep informed by the doctor though out the procedure. That kept me in curious and confident. This is what any patient looking for. He is soft spoken and very down to earth person.
I wish him to keep up the same level of services

** ** ******* * *** ** *** **** ** ****** 
Friendly 
Helping 
Treats patient with utmost care 
Regards 
Kalpana Gowrishankar

review: Dr. Vikrant sir saved my mother in time. Very cooperative and was available mid night 3am as it was emergency. Also discuss and explain in detail the facts.
